name: Peace Pilot
description:
The Game

Spray water all over the flowers, make them grow and spread peace all over the world! This video game was originally made for the Weekly Game Jame #161 with "Pilot" as the theme.

Rules

Use the keyboard to move the aircraft, spray water and use superpowers. Avoid hitting the white and yellow birds. Enjoy this endless peaceful journey for free. Windows only. Full screen available.

Software

  • Game Engine - Game Maker Studio 2
  • Graphic Design - Piskel, Adobe Illustrator, Paint.NET
  • Sound Design - Adobe Audition

Sound Library

All the sounds are from https://freesound.org/
Check the Audio Asset for the complete lists of SFX and their authors.
